mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_LNM, STD_ERR_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, MSG_DIT, STD_ERR_CD_YN, ACTN_CD, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, STSY_ERR_CD, TSK_DMN, MNG_USER, BIZ_DIT, MSG_TYP

RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_LNM, STD_ERR_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, MSG_DIT, STD_ERR_CD_YN, ACTN_CD, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, STSY_ERR_CD, TSK_DMN, MNG_USER, BIZ_DIT, MSG_TYP
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.insert */ into WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, STD_ERR_MSG_ID, STD_ERR_MSG_LNM, STD_ERR_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, MSG_DIT, STD_ERR_CD_YN, ACTN_CD, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, STSY_ERR_CD, TSK_DMN, MNG_USER, BIZ_DIT, MSG_TYP ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdErrMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdErrMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdErrCdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stsyErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tskDmn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mngUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.insertSelective */ into WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG
RQST_NO,

ERR_CD,
ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS,
ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS,
OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS,
OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS,
ERR_CD_APL_DT,
STSY_ERR_CD,
TSK_DMN,
MNG_USER,
BIZ_DIT,
MSG_TYP,

mapper.update:
update /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG
STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_ERR_MSG_LNM = #{stdErrMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_ERR_MSG_PNM = #{stdErrMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_TP_CD = #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_DIT = #{msgDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_ERR_CD_YN = #{stdErrCdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS = #{isdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS = #{osdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CD_APL_DT = #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STSY_ERR_CD = #{stsyErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TSK_DMN = #{tskDmn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MNG_USER = #{mngUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIZ_DIT = #{bizDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG_TYP = #{msgTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG set STD_ERR_MSG_ID = #{stdErrMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_ERR_MSG_LNM = #{stdErrMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_ERR_MSG_PNM = #{stdErrMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_TP_CD = #{errTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_DIT = #{msgDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_ERR_CD_YN = #{stdErrCdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD = #{errCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{isdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS = #{isdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS = #{osdErrCasCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS = #{osdErrActnCts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CD_APL_DT = #{errCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STSY_ERR_CD = #{stsyErrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSK_DMN = #{tskDmn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNG_USER = #{mngUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZ_DIT = #{bizDit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MSG_TYP = #{msgTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.selectMsgRqstListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID, A.STD_ERR_MSG_LNM, A.STD_ERR_MSG_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, A.ERR_TP_CD, A.MSG_DIT, A.STD_ERR_CD_YN, A.ACTN_CD, A.ERR_CD, A.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, A.ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, A.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, A.OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, A.ERR_CD_APL_DT, A.STSY_ERR_CD, A.TSK_DMN, A.MNG_USER, A.BIZ_DIT, A.MSG_TYP FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.STD_ERR_MSG_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.STD_ERR_MSG_ID = A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID --AND CASE WHEN A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN A.ERR_CD ELSE A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID END = CASE WHEN A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN B.ERR_CD ELSE B.STD_ERR_MSG_ID END ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateErrCd */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A SET ERR_CD = IFNULL((SELECT ERR_CD FROM(SELECT C.MSG_TYP||C.MSG_DIT||C.BIZ_DIT ||LPAD(MAX(SUBSTR(M.ERR_CD, 6,9))+RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY C.MSG_TYP,C.MSG_DIT,C.BIZ_DIT ORDER BY C.RQST_SNO) , 4, '0') AS ERR_CD, C.RQST_SNO FROM (SELECT MAX(ERR_CD) ERR_CD, B.MSG_TYP,B.MSG_DIT,B.BIZ_DIT FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.ERR_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY B.MSG_TYP,B.MSG_DIT,B.BIZ_DIT) M INNER JOIN WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG C ON M.MSG_TYP = C.MSG_TYP AND M.MSG_DIT = C.MSG_DIT AND M.BIZ_DIT = C.BIZ_DIT AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY C.MSG_TYP,C.MSG_DIT,C.BIZ_DIT, C.RQST_SNO ) Q WHERE A.RQST_SNO = Q.RQST_SNO ),A.MSG_TYP||A.MSG_DIT||A.BIZ_DIT||'0001') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG D WHERE A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND A.RQST_NO != D.RQST_NO UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG E WHERE A.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND E.MSG_TYP||E.MSG_DIT||E.BIZ_DIT != SUBSTR(E.ERR_CD,1,5) )
mapper.insert:
/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkRequestMsg */
--검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 메시지 존재....(MS012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkNotExistMsg */
--검증쿼리 존재하지 않는 메시지 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG D WHERE A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkLenMsg */
--검증쿼리 MS003 길이체크 (9) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.ERR_CD) != 9

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkMsgCdNameMache */
--검증쿼리 MS010 메시지코드 명명규칙 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND SUBSTR(A.ERR_CD,1,5) != A.MSG_TYP||A.MSG_DIT||A.BIZ_DIT

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkMsgCdNamecheck */
--검증쿼리 MS011 메시지코드 명명규칙 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.MSG_TYP = 'D' AND A.BIZ_DIT != 'COR'

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkMsgCdName */
--검증쿼리 MS004 메시지코드 명명규칙 체크 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND (SUBSTR(A.MSG_CD,1,1) != 'M' OR SUBSTR(A.MSG_CD,2,1) NOT IN ('I','E','Q' ) OR SUBSTR(A.MSG_CD,3,2) NOT IN (SELECT B.comm_dtl_cd AS CODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DCD A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') and COMM_DCD = 'BIZ_DIV_CD' ) OR REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(A.MSG_CD,5,4),'\d','9')!='9999')

/* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.checkNotChgData */
--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG D WHERE A.ERR_CD = D.ERR_CD AND IFNULL(A.STD_ERR_MSG_LNM , '') = IFNULL(D.STD_ERR_MSG_LNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.STD_ERR_MSG_PNM , '') = IFNULL(D.STD_ERR_MSG_PNM , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_TP_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_TP_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.MSG_DIT, '') = IFNULL(D.MSG_DIT , '') AND IFNULL(A.STD_ERR_CD_YN, '') = IFNULL(D.STD_ERR_CD_YN , '') AND IFNULL(A.ACTN_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.ACTN_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, '') = IFNULL(D.ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS , '') AND IFNULL(A.ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, '') = IFNULL(D.ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS , '') AND IFNULL(A.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, '') = IFNULL(D.OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS , '') AND IFNULL(A.OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, '') = IFNULL(D.OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS , '') AND IFNULL(A.ERR_CD_APL_DT, '') = IFNULL(D.ERR_CD_APL_DT , '') AND IFNULL(A.STSY_ERR_CD, '') = IFNULL(D.STSY_ERR_CD , '') AND IFNULL(A.TSK_DMN, '') = IFNULL(D.TSK_DMN , '') AND IFNULL(A.MNG_USER, '') = IFNULL(D.MNG_USER , '') AND IFNULL(A.BIZ_DIT, '') = IFNULL(D.BIZ_DIT , '') AND IFNULL(A.MSG_TYP, '') = IFNULL(D.MSG_TYP , '') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: STD_ERR_MSG_LNM, STD_ERR_MSG_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ERR_TP_CD, MSG_DIT, STD_ERR_CD_YN, ACTN_CD, ERR_CD, ISD_ERR_CAS_CTS, ISD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, OSD_ERR_CAS_CTS, OSD_ERR_ACTN_CTS, ERR_CD_APL_DT, STSY_ERR_CD, TSK_DMN, MNG_USER, BIZ_DIT, MSG_TYP
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A SET (STD_ERR_MSG_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.STD_ERR_MSG_ID AS STD_ERR_MSG_ID , IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_STD_ERR_MSG A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_STD_ERR_MSG SELECT A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID,
FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_STD_ERR_MSG A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ERR_CD = A.ERR_CD ) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT /* WaqStdErrMsgMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_STD_ERR_MSG SELECT A.STD_ERR_MSG_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM ,
FROM WAQ_STD_ERR_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
